attributes.additional_details:
The current owners of Coventry City FC are planning to ground share with Walsall because they cannot reach an agreement with the landlords ACL.

I propose that moving a team away from it's home city purely to avoid paying rent should be illegal, and that any club moving away should first get the consent of the fans before it could even contemplate such a move. Also owners of football teams should not be allowed to create multiple shell companies. There should be one company - the club and that is it!
